mapper.sql: STAFF_ID AS staffId, DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, PERMISSION_ID AS permissionId
mapper.select: select DISTINCT STAFF_NAME from t_white_list a,t_staff b where a.STAFF_ID = b.STAFF_ID ${ew.sqlSegment}
select distinct DEPARTMENT_NAME from t_white_list a, t_department b, t_staff c where a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID and a.STAFF_ID = c.STAFF_ID ${ew.sqlSegment}
select distinct PERMISSION_NAME from t_white_list a, t_permission b ,t_staff c where a.PERMISSION_ID = b.PERMISSION_ID and a.STAFF_ID = c.STAFF_ID ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.STAFF_ID,d.STAFF_NAME, a.PERMISSION_Id,PERMISSION_NAME,a.DEPARTMENT_ID,DEPARTMENT_NAME from t_white_list a,t_department b,t_permission c,t_staff d
(a.STAFF_ID like #{condition} or d.STAFF_NAME like #{condition}) and a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID and a.PERMISSION_ID = c.PERMISSION_ID and a.STAFF_ID = d.STAFF_ID
order by a.STAFF_ID ASC
